name: Reflection (itch) (amdotblacksheep)
description:
WARNING, THIS GAME IS NOT COMPLETED
The game is missing some elements that I could not complete due to the timing.
They are:

  • sound effects (unfortunately for the atmosphere )
  • tutorial (read it below)

TUTORIAL

BODY
Body is at  the top of the screen.
Move : A and D
Jump: W
Fall from platform: S
If Body dies, the game reloads from the last checkpoint.

SOUL
Soul is at the bottom of the screen. If Soul is too far from Body, Soul will try to reach it.
Move: Arrow LEFT and Arrow RIGHT
Jump: Arrow UP
Fall from platform: Arrow DOWN
If Soul dies, Body has 5 seconds to find and pick Soul's container! Otherwise also Body will die.

THE GAME

This game is a submission to the GMTK Jam 2021.

Two friends are playing carelessly together when one of them falls into a cliff. The other one goes after him in order to find and help him.. once she reaches her friend, he runs away.. What's going on? What is this place? Will she be able to bring her friend home? And what about her?
